name: Java
caption: Java development team
description: Our Java development team has worked on multiple projects in Java application development for frontend, backend and CMS. Java is one of the few languages that can be used for multiple purposes across all domains. But identifying and implementing the right code based on your use cases is the trick.

name: Cricket
caption: Either hit a wicket or give a free hit...
description: Cricket is not a sport but a religion is India, being played in every nook & corner of the country. First cricket club was established in Calcutta in 1792!

name: Badminton
caption: A bad day of badminton is better than a good day at work!
description: Badminton is the second-most played sport in India after Cricket. To succeed in Badminton, you need ‘Sindhu’ of strength and focus on your ‘Lakshya’!

name: Table Tennis
caption: Play ping pong – the ultimate workout!
description: TT started in 1880s in England as game-makers were trying to emulate the popularity of lawn tennis and today its most popular indoor sports

name: Swimming
caption: Swim to Live. Live to Swim…
description: Why pool-side, have a party inside one. The only sport with no half times, no substitutions, no timeouts, and you only get 1 shot for your goal

name: Chess
caption: The blunders are all there on board, waiting to be made…
description: Chess is one of the oldest and most popular board games. For a change the objective of the game is to capture the opponent’s King & not Queen!

name: Carrom
caption: No boredom on this  board game!
description: Carrom is a tabletop game of Indian origin and is one of the world's favourite indoor board games. It’s all about flick of your finger!
